item.title: New Website
item.description: This morning I launched my new website. I used to be one of those designers that never reserved time for my brand, only working for clients and never on myself. As a result, Iâ€™ve never been really proud of my site. I need to go back in history to my first portfolio site, that I superstitiously launch on September 9th, 2009 (09/09/09) looking for a bit of luck, raining clients or some kind of help.
